Build Your Project With Best Valve

Pneumatic Ultra High Vacuum Gate Valve

ZCCQ Pneumatic Ultra-High Vacuum Gate Valve

Ultra-High Vacuum Compatibility With Robust Construction

Are you in pursuit of precise control and reliable sealing in ultra-high vacuum environments? Look no further than the ZCCQ Pneumatic Ultra-High Vacuum Gate Valve. This exceptional valve is designed to elevate your operations by providing unrivaled performance and a host of remarkable features.

Ultra-High Vacuum Compatibility: The ZCCQ gate valve boasts exceptional compatibility with ultra-high vacuum conditions, ensuring optimal sealing performance and maintaining the integrity of your vacuum system.

Robust Construction: Crafted from high-quality materials, such as stainless steel, this gate valve offers exceptional durability, corrosion resistance, and longevity, even in demanding operating environments.

Tight and Reliable Sealing

Equipped with advanced sealing mechanisms, including metal-to-metal or elastomer seals, the ZCCQ gate valve guarantees a tight and reliable seal, minimizing gas leakage and maximizing system efficiency.

Precise and Fast Actuation

With its pneumatic actuation mechanism, the CCQ gate valve enables precise control and rapid response. Experience seamless opening and closing operations, allowing for efficient workflow and optimized processes.

Position Indication

Stay informed with the built-in position indication feature of the ZCCQ gate valve. Mechanical switches or sensors provide real-time feedback, keeping you updated on the valve's open or closed position.

Tech Specifications & Dimensions

Our pneumatic high vacuum butterfly valves come in different types. For tech professionals who demand uncompromising control and precision in their vacuum environments, Dazhong Valve's pneumatic Ultra high vacuum gate valves stand as the definitive answer.

Go beyond mere technology and experience the difference exceptional engineering and unwavering dedication to quality make
